main event: On 8 August 1958, a sighting was reported in Flat Rock, Michigan, involving an unidentified object that was rising and falling, leaving a major trail, and traveling from East to West.
interesting points: The sighting was reported at 0424 GMT, The object was described as medium-sized and round in shape, The source of the report is unknown, The evaluation of the object included possibilities of it being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena, No photographs are present in the report.
witness description: Capt. T.C. Warner from WP Air Services
